rooms.description: A spacious entrance that aligns with Vastu principles, allowing positive energy to flow into the apartment. Includes a small reception area and storage.
Bohemian style living room with ample natural light, high ceilings, large windows facing the garden for ventilation. Decorated with eclectic art and vibrant textiles.
An open dining space that opens into the living room, featuring natural light through French windows. Uses sustainable materials and organic finishes.
Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, designed for optimal workflow and ventilation, integrating natural elements like stone countertops and wood accents in line with Bohemian aesthetics.
Service area including laundry and storage for kitchen supplies, designed to support a clutter-free living environment.
Well-planned bathroom with proper ventilation and natural light. Equipped with modern fixtures, keeping in mind Vastu principles for water features.

openings.description: A welcoming main door designed to enhance the flow of positive energy according to Vastu, with ample natural light filtering in.
Large windows on the east and south walls to maximize natural light and ventilation. These openings are in line with Vastu guidelines for sunlight exposure.
A balcony adjoining the living room, providing direct access to the garden and natural ventilation. Integrates seamlessly with the Bohemian design theme.

additional_features.description: A large, green garden that surrounds the apartment. Designed with native plants and a small water feature to enhance natural ventilation and cooling.
A spacious swimming pool integrated into the garden area. Offers relaxation, exercise opportunities, and enhances the overall aesthetic appeal of the apartment.
